    Personal Tutor

    Provided one-on-one tutoring for undergraduate students as well as elementary school students within Baltimore public schools.

    PILOT Leader

    As a PILOT leader at Hopkins I provided academic support to students in peer-led tutoring sessions within numerous classes, including Multivariate Calculus and Organic Chemistry.

    Teaching Assistant

    While at Hopkins I was a teaching assistant for both introductory and intermediate organic chemistry laboratory courses.

    teaching

    Undergraduate Research Assistant

    Researched in the labs of Dr. J.D. Tovar studying physical organic chemistry and Dr. Lan Cheng studying electronic structure theory.

    Research Intern

    Researched the mechanisms involved with tissue inflammation and scarring in patients with idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis with Dr. Tristan Kooistra and Dr. Benjamin Medoff.

    Research Intern

    Studied and developed new methods for advancing real-time data analysis through automatic signal structure and phase change detection with Dr. David Elbert and Dr. Tyrel McQueen.
